amendment.description: To clarify the uses of the BLM Permit Processing Improvement Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3822 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3822 proposed by Senator Heitkamp for Senator Udall NM.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3822 proposed by Senator Heitkamp for Senator Udall NM.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3822 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
